comments:

Created an attachment (id=74718)
patch

workingSet.getId() can return null. Patch reverses equality check to avoid NPE.
Applied patch to HEAD. Mike, please verify patch and apply to 3.3.1.
Workaround for user: You should be able to turn off your window working set to realize the run/debug dialog.
